p: In the model marsh of San Bruno (Guadiana Estuary), the number of tussocks identified as S. densiflora × maritima in middle marshes (205 tussocks) was much higher than that of S. maritima × densiflora in low marshes (18 tussocks). According to the estimated ages of these tussocks, the first hybrid to be established was S. densiflora × maritima (ca. year 1813) while the first tussock of S. maritima × densiflora did not appear until 1984. Since 2007, no novel tussocks of S. densiflora × maritima have been established, while the latest tussock of S. maritima × densiflora dates back to 2016 ( Figure 4).
